response.overview: n aspiring young filmmaker (Appukutty) is plying his trade to materialise his dream of becoming an independent film director in his own ways and the dreams of him have been long plagued as his ambitious efforts to pursue greener pastures have always become futile leading to him being distraught and agonizing with zero hopes. Appukutty apparently finally has the last laugh as when it seemed all over for him in terms of reviving his dreams of foraying into cinema field, he gets a slice of luck after meeting producer Santha Bharathi in a serendipitous occasion. Appukutty then showcases his storytelling abilities by narrating the script to the producer where the former apparently gives his input by how casteism and honor killing are induced in the society by some individuals with vested interests to achieve their agenda of causing problems among lovers.[1]
response.title: Sooriyanum sooriyakanthiyum
